TEST_NAME: Tables should have a data load definition
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn, --return Y or N to determine if pass or fail
       ao.object_name table_name, --self-evident
       ao.object_id unqid, --row-level unique id 
       null code, --message describing the violation
       ao.object_id
from user_objects ao
where 1=1
and ao.object_type = 'TABLE'
